Rufford Abbey, Rufford Country Park, Notts. Rebranded as "Celebration Brass".
Contest for 2nd/3rd/4th section bands.
8 bands played. Highest placed 3rd section band not in prizes - Whitwell Highest placed fourth section band not in prizes - Thurcroft Best Soloist - Horn player - Shirland
